body.name: Glass Butter Dish with Lid from 1500 C Tabletop Farm-house Heavy Thick Cover Clear 2-Piece Keeper for Countertop European holder sticks Kitchen Dishwasher Safe
deliveryMessages: $10.17 delivery Tuesday, March 5. Order within 53 mins
features: Fits European Size Butter: The glass butter dish fits European size butter, you can use it to keep a stick of butter in. A dish where the lid doesn't come in contact with the butter will accommodate a regular sized package of cream cheese. Match for Irish butter. Dimensions: 6.5inchx4.0inchx2.9inch
A Good Solid Dish: Made of durable glass. It is very thick-walled and substantial. The glass butter dish with lid has a nice weight to it. It is made of high quality materials and craftsmanship

Featured with Ridge Design: There are vertical ridges on the side. The clear cover etched with the word 'BUTTER' on the top of cover allows you to see how much butter is left and keeps butter cool and fresh. It adds beauty to your counter-top with this pretty dish
Preserve Perfectly Your Butter: It preserves and presents butter flavor exactly as intended. It is classic and farm-house. Great for any event and durable for daily use
BPA free, Lead free. Dishwasher, refrigerator safe. Do not put it in Microwave or Freezer
body.description: Premium Throw Pillow Cover,Decorative Pillow ,Modern Cushion Cover For Indoor Bedroom ,Sofa ,Living Room,Car. Size:18 x 18 inches/45 x 45 cm Package: Set of 1 Throw pillow covers only(not includ pillow inserts) Wash instruction:Both machine washable and the hands washable, machine washable in cold water. Feature: It is extremely soft and comfortable, and very resistant to dirt. Decorating it indoors not only makes the room more beautiful, but aslo can adjust familys’ mood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great butter dish
reviews.reviewText: Love this butter dish! It fits two sticks of butter side by side or one large Kerigold bar of butter. Very happy 😃

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent item but breakable, good price
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased to replace the one I broke when I opened fridge door too fast and top came offIt is heavy glass stands up except to ceramic tile floors st 5 feetWashes up wellButter can be left out in it with top on to keep whatever out except legitimate users and clumsy husbands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these for a pound of Kerry Gold, butter!
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite butter dishes, 1 pound of carry gold or two sticks of traditional butter fit perfectly. I like to slice it up all at one time, this is nice enough to put on the table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty and lovely!
reviews.reviewText: Love this. It will go with any decor. Heavy duty glass and not fragile at all. Great aesthetic. The only thing I would say negative about this is that the lid doesn't fit as snug to the bottom. Would definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Wide size, good for European butter sizes (or 2 sticks) - very nice heavy glass

reviews.reviewText: This butter dish is so sturdy - a necessity in my home! I like the larger size - allows for random butter placement by careless hands.

reviews.reviewText: I've switched to Irish butter and needed the right size butter dish. So perfect I ordered a 2nd one the day I received the 1st.
